subsections.resignation_details: On January 11, 2023, Carl Eschenbach, a director of Zoom Video Communications, Inc. (the "Company"), notified the board of directors of the Company (the "Board") of his decision to resign from his position as a member of the Board, effective immediately.
subsections.reason_for_resignation: Mr. Eschenbachâ€™s resignation did not result from any disagreements with the Company on any matter relating to its operations, policies or practices.
